sourcesContent:
import pinyin from 'pinyin';

// Pinyinを生成する関数
const generatePinyin = (characters) => {
    return pinyin(characters.join(''), { style: pinyin.STYLE_TONE });
};


export const problemGroups = [
    {
        name: 'HSK1',
        problems: [
{correctOrder: ["爸爸","今天","不","在","家"],translation: "お父さんは今日家にいません", pinyin: generatePinyin(["爸爸","今天","不","在","家"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_01.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["妈妈","在","上班"],translation: "お母さんは仕事にいっています", pinyin: generatePinyin(["妈妈","在","上班"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_02.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["你","儿子","今年","几","岁","了","？"],translation: "あなたの息子は今年何歳ですか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["你","儿子","今年","几","岁","了","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_03.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","女儿","在","北京","上","大学"],translation: "私の娘は北京の大学に通っています", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","女儿","在","北京","上","大学"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_04.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["老師，","你","会","说","日语","吗","？"],translation: "先生、日本語話せますか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["老師，","你","会","说","日语","吗","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_05.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["学生","应该","好好","学习"],translation: "学生は熱心に勉強するべきだ", pinyin: generatePinyin(["学生","应该","好好","学习"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_06.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["小王","是","我","同学"],translation: "王さんは私の同級生です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["小王","是","我","同学"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_07.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["这","是","我","朋友","送","我的","礼物"],translation: "これは友達が私にくれたプレゼントです", pinyin: generatePinyin(["这","是","我","朋友","送","我的","礼物"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_08.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","爸爸","是","医生"],translation: "お父さんは医者です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","爸爸","是","医生"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_09.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["先生，","您的","钱包","丢","了"],translation: "お客様（男性）、財布を落とされましたよ", pinyin: generatePinyin(["先生，","您的","钱包","丢","了"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_10.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["您好，","陈","女士","！"],translation: "陳さん（女性）、こんにちは！", pinyin: generatePinyin(["您好，","陈","女士","！"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_11.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","是","日本人"],translation: "私は日本人です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","是","日本人"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_12.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["今天","放假"],translation: "今日は休みです", pinyin: generatePinyin(["今天","放假"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_13.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["明天","是","晴天"],translation: "明日は晴れです", pinyin: generatePinyin(["明天","是","晴天"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_14.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["昨天","下雨","了"],translation: "昨日は雨が降りました", pinyin: generatePinyin(["昨天","下雨","了"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_15.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["这","是","上午","的","课"],translation: "これは午前の授業です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["这","是","上午","的","课"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_16.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["现在","是","中午","12","点"],translation: "今は昼12時です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["现在","是","中午","12","点"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_17.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","下午","有","空"],translation: "午後空いています", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","下午","有","空"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_18.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["今年","是","2022年"],translation: "今年は2022年です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["今年","是","2022年"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_19.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["10月","1日","是","中国","的","国庆节"],translation: "10月1日は中国の国慶節です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["10月","1日","是","中国","的","国庆节"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_20.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["12月","1日","是","我","的","生日"],translation: "12月1日は私の誕生日です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["12月","1日","是","我","的","生日"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_21.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["今天","是","10月","15号"],translation: "今日は10月15日です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["今天","是","10月","15号"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_22.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["明天","是","星期六"],translation: "明日は土曜日です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["明天","是","星期六"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_23.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["几","点","了","？"],translation: "何時ですか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["几","点","了","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_24.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["现在","下午","3点","了"],translation: "今は午後3時です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["现在","下午","3点","了"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_25.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","小","時候","最","喜欢","游泳"],translation: "小さい頃泳ぐのが一番好きでした", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","小","時候","最","喜欢","游泳"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_26.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["今天","天气","很","好"],translation: "今日は天気がいい", pinyin: generatePinyin(["今天","天气","很","好"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_27.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["这","是","小明","的","东西"],translation: "これは明さんのものです", pinyin: generatePinyin(["这","是","小明","的","东西"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_28.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["你","的","衣服","真","好看"],translation: "あなたの服はとてもいいですね", pinyin: generatePinyin(["你","的","衣服","真","好看"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_29.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","不","喜欢","看","书"],translation: "私は読書が好きではありません", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","不","喜欢","看","书"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_30.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","忘记","这个","字","怎么","写","了"],translation: "この字をどうやって書くか忘れました", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","忘记","这个","字","怎么","写","了"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_31.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","的","名字","是","李小明"],translation: "私の名前は李小明です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","的","名字","是","李小明"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_32.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["你","想","喝","水","吗","？"],translation: "水いりますか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["你","想","喝","水","吗","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_33.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["请","喝","茶"],translation: "お茶をお飲みください", pinyin: generatePinyin(["请","喝","茶"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_34.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["用","这个","杯子","喝","茶","吧"],translation: "このコップを使ってお茶を飲んでください", pinyin: generatePinyin(["用","这个","杯子","喝","茶","吧"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_35.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["你","喜欢","吃","什么","菜","？"],translation: "どの料理が好きですか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["你","喜欢","吃","什么","菜","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_36.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["你","喜欢","面条","还是","米饭","？"],translation: "麺類が好きですか？それともご飯が好きですか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["你","喜欢","面条","还是","米饭","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_37.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["饭","后","吃","一点","水果","吧"],translation: "ご飯のあとフルーツを少し食べましょう", pinyin: generatePinyin(["饭","后","吃","一点","水果","吧"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_38.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["苹果","很","好吃"],translation: "りんごは美味しい", pinyin: generatePinyin(["苹果","很","好吃"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_39.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["桌子","上","有","一本","书"],translation: "机に一冊の本があります", pinyin: generatePinyin(["桌子","上","有","一本","书"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_40.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["椅子","在","桌子","的","前面"],translation: "椅子は机の前にある", pinyin: generatePinyin(["椅子","在","桌子","的","前面"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_41.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["这个","多少","钱","？"],translation: "これはいくらですか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["这个","多少","钱","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_42.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["狗","在","椅子","的","下面"],translation: "犬が椅子の下にいる", pinyin: generatePinyin(["狗","在","椅子","的","下面"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_43.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["猫","喜欢","和","狗","打架"],translation: "猫は犬と喧嘩をよくします", pinyin: generatePinyin(["猫","喜欢","和","狗","打架"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_44.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","是","坐","飞机","来","上海","的"],translation: "飛行機に乗って上海に来ました", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","是","坐","飞机","来","上海","的"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_45.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","想","坐","出租車","回","家"],translation: "タクシーに乗って家に帰りたい", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","想","坐","出租車","回","家"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_46.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["爸爸","在","看","电视"],translation: "お父さんはテレビを見ています", pinyin: generatePinyin(["爸爸","在","看","电视"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_47.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["小明","在","玩","电脑"],translation: "明さんはパソコンをしています", pinyin: generatePinyin(["小明","在","玩","电脑"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_48.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","昨天","和","朋友","去","看","电影","了"],translation: "私は昨日友達と映画を見にいきました", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","昨天","和","朋友","去","看","电影","了"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_49.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","在","家","写","作业"],translation: "私は家で宿題をします", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","在","家","写","作业"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_50.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["学校","今天","放假"],translation: "今日は学校が休みです", pinyin: generatePinyin(["学校","今天","放假"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_51.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["这个","饭店","做","的","菜","很","好吃"],translation: "このレストランの料理は美味しいです", pinyin: generatePinyin(["这个","饭店","做","的","菜","很","好吃"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_52.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["这个","商店","卖","的","东西","很","多"],translation: "このお店ではたくさんのものが売っています", pinyin: generatePinyin(["这个","商店","卖","的","东西","很","多"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_53.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["明天","我","要","去","医院"],translation: "明日病院に行かなければいけない", pinyin: generatePinyin(["明天","我","要","去","医院"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_54.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["车站","就","在","医院","旁边"],translation: "駅は病院の隣です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["车站","就","在","医院","旁边"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_55.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["中国","在","日本","的","西边"],translation: "中国は日本の西側です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["中国","在","日本","的","西边"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_56.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["日本","离","中国","很近"],translation: "日本は中国から近い", pinyin: generatePinyin(["日本","离","中国","很近"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_57.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["你","是","怎么","来","北京","的","？"],translation: "あなたはどうやって北京に来ましたか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["你","是","怎么","来","北京","的","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_58.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["你","会","说","汉语","吗","？"],translation: "中国語を話せますか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["你","会","说","汉语","吗","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_59.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["椅子","上","有","一只","猫"],translation: "椅子の上に1匹の猫がいる", pinyin: generatePinyin(["椅子","上","有","一只","猫"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_60.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","在","楼","下","等","你"],translation: "ビルの下で待ってます", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","在","楼","下","等","你"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_61.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["前面","有","一个","饭店"],translation: "前にレストランがある", pinyin: generatePinyin(["前面","有","一个","饭店"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_62.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["饭店","在","学校","的","后面"],translation: "レストランが学校の後ろにある", pinyin: generatePinyin(["饭店","在","学校","的","后面"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_63.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["商店","里","有","很","多","文具"],translation: "店にたくさんの文房具がある", pinyin: generatePinyin(["商店","里","有","很","多","文具"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_64.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","最近","身体","不","太","好"],translation: "最近体の調子がよくありません", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","最近","身体","不","太","好"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_65.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我们","一起","去","吃","饭","吧","？"],translation: "一緒にご飯を食べにいきませんか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我们","一起","去","吃","饭","吧","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_66.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["你","什么","时候","回","北京","？"],translation: "あなたはいつ北京に戻りますか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["你","什么","时候","回","北京","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_67.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["你们","一起","回","来","吗","？"],translation: "あなたたちは一緒に戻りますか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["你们","一起","回","来","吗","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_68.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["他","不","回","北京","了",],translation: "彼は北京に戻らなくなった", pinyin: generatePinyin(["他","不","回","北京","了",]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_69.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["她","跟","我","一起","回","来"],translation: "彼女は私と一緒に戻ります", pinyin: generatePinyin(["她","跟","我","一起","回","来"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_70.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["他们","想","去","上海","旅游"],translation: "彼らは上海に旅行に行きたい", pinyin: generatePinyin(["他们","想","去","上海","旅游"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_71.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["她们","不","想","坐","飞机","去","上海"],translation: "彼女たちは飛行機に乗って上海に行きたくない", pinyin: generatePinyin(["她们","不","想","坐","飞机","去","上海"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_72.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["谁","都","不","在","家"],translation: "誰も家にいません", pinyin: generatePinyin(["谁","都","不","在","家"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_73.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["这","是","我","的","猫"],translation: "これは私の猫です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["这","是","我","的","猫"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_74.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["那","是","我","的","书包"],translation: "あれは私のカバンです", pinyin: generatePinyin(["那","是","我","的","书包"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_75.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["他","去","哪","了","？"],translation: "彼はどこに行ったの？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["他","去","哪","了","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_76.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["这儿","是","学校"],translation: "ここは学校です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["这儿","是","学校"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_77.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["那儿","是","医院"],translation: "あそこは病院です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["那儿","是","医院"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_78.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["车站","在","哪儿","？"],translation: "駅はどこですか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["车站","在","哪儿","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_79.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["你","爸爸","叫","什么","名字","？"],translation: "あなたのお父さんのお名前は？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["你","爸爸","叫","什么","名字","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_80.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["你","家","有","几口","人","？"],translation: "何人家族ですか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["你","家","有","几口","人","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_81.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["这","些","苹果","多少","钱","？"],translation: "これらのりんごはいくらですか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["这","些","苹果","多少","钱","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_82.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["这","是","怎么","回事","？"],translation: "これは何事だ？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["这","是","怎么","回事","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_83.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["今天","天气","怎么样","？"],translation: "今日の天気はどうですか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["今天","天气","怎么样","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_84.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","是","北京大学","的","学生"],translation: "私は北京大学の学生です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","是","北京大学","的","学生"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_85.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","有","一只","猫"],translation: "猫を一匹飼っている", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","有","一只","猫"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_86.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","不","会","做","菜"],translation: "私は料理ができない", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","不","会","做","菜"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_87.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","喜欢","看","电视"],translation: "テレビを見るのが好きだ", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","喜欢","看","电视"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_88.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","喜欢","听","英文","歌"],translation: "英語の曲を聞くのが好きだ", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","喜欢","听","英文","歌"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_89.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["小明，","你","会","说","英语","吗","？"],translation: "明さんは英語を話せますか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["小明，","你","会","说","英语","吗","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_90.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["读","书","是","很","重要","的"],translation: "本を読むのは大切だ", pinyin: generatePinyin(["读","书","是","很","重要","的"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_91.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","每天","都","会","写","日记"],translation: "私は毎日日記を書く", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","每天","都","会","写","日记"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_92.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","在","公园","看見","他","了"],translation: "私は公園で彼を見かけた", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","在","公园","看見","他","了"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_93.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","叫","李言"],translation: "私は李言です", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","叫","李言"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_94.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","来","了"],translation: "きたよ", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","来","了"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_95.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["她","去","上班","了"],translation: "彼女は仕事に行った", pinyin: generatePinyin(["她","去","上班","了"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_96.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["我","明年","就","回","日本","了"],translation: "私は来年には日本に戻ります", pinyin: generatePinyin(["我","明年","就","回","日本","了"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_97.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["你","喜欢","吃","青菜","吗","？"],translation: "あなたは野菜を食べるのが好きですか？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["你","喜欢","吃","青菜","吗","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_98.mp3')},
{correctOrder: ["喝","点","什么","好","呢","？"],translation: "何を飲めばいい？", pinyin: generatePinyin(["喝","点","什么","好","呢","？"]),audio: require('./audio/HSK1_99.mp3')},
